data.name: MudGate
data.detailed_description:
MudGate is an online action role-playing and exploration game where you can interact with everything.



You play anything you wish; be anything you want, roam free with your friends who fights towering monsters, delves perilous dungeons, defends the realm of Icemire against all threats.

You train your skills and combat based on the classes you choose, and follow a story to build their your own private realm where you can enjoy the seclusion and safety of your own realm or participate in the open realms with others.

FEATURES:

  • Character customization with 5 playable races.
  • Support for common MUD commands.
  • 18 humanoid races, creatures and animals to explore, interact and fight.
  • Rich variety of handcrafted realms and procedurally generated dungeons.
  • 1 to 500 players can participate in a realm or dungeon instance.
  • Realms PVP modes are safe, equipment-safe, and free for all.
  • Combat and abilities are noted with dice notations (d20) with results in log window.
  • Persistent player inventory and goal progression.
  • Party with up to 8 players or npc companions.
  • Multi-faceted skill system to create your perfect build.
  • Hundreds of weapons, armor and items to wear, wield and interact with.
  • Text commands to invoke environment or item functions.
  • Iterative game design and community feedback-driven development.

data.short_description: MudGate is an online action role-playing and exploration game where you can interact with everything, and follow a story to build your own private realm where you can enjoy the seclusion and safety of your own realm or participate in the open realms with others.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.33GHz or faster x86-compatible processor, or Intel Atom™ 1.6GHz or faster processor for netbook class devices
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GFX
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X v10.6, and above
  • Processor: 2.33GHz or faster x86-compatible processor, or Intel Atom™ 1.6GHz or faster processor for netbook class devices
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
